	Subject: RE: Quotation RABDAN ONE : REAL EMIRATES ( REAL FZE ) - Addition of Vehicle wef 03/01/2024

	 

	Dear Rami,

	 

	Hope all is well.

	 

	With reference to the trailing e-mail, kindly provide the insurer with the details of the Rabdan workshop in Abu Dhabi, location and any contact details in hand.

	 

	The reason for the request is since this is a very new vehicle in the market, the insurer needs to know that the vehicle can be repaired in case of an accident at a qualified dealership workshop.

	 

	Any details you can provide will help the insurer to be able to cover the vehicle for a comprehensive insurance.

	 

	Look forward to hearing from you.

	 

	Best Regards,

	Hagop

	 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​

	3.	Submits orginal Emirates ID and Completes Registration
	4.	After registration, we deliver the car to customer location (Home).

	Subject: RE: Quotation RABDAN ONE : REAL EMIRATES ( REAL FZE ) - Addition of Vehicle wef 03/01/2024

	 

	Dear Rami,

	 

	Hope all is well.

	 

	With reference to the trailing e-mail, kindly provide the insurer with the details of the Rabdan workshop in Abu Dhabi, location and any contact details in hand.

	 

	The reason for the request is since this is a very new vehicle in the market, the insurer needs to know that the vehicle can be repaired in case of an accident at a qualified dealership workshop.

With reference to the trailing e-mail, kindly provide the insurer with the details of the Rabdan workshop in Abu Dhabi, location and any contact details in hand.

	 

	The reason for the request is since this is a very new vehicle in the market, the insurer needs to know that the vehicle can be repaired in case of an accident at a qualified dealership workshop.

	 

	Any details you can provide will help the insurer to be able to cover the vehicle for a comprehensive insurance.

	 

	Look forward to hearing from you.

	 

	Best Regards,

	Hagop

	 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION ‑ INSURANCE

REAL FZE

DUBAI

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 8045000

This message is from an external sender - be cautious, particularly with links and attachments.
	رسالة من مرسل خارجي - كن حذرًا مع الروابط والمرفقات

	Dear May,

	 

	Currently in Dubai we have been registering for individual customer, but havent done for Companies.

	 

	Process:

	1.	We issue a sale letter to customer
	2.	Customer visits RTA at AG Auto Muraqabat area https://g.co/kgs/AygYDB <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Furl.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com%2Fs%2FIog4Co6w4UDmngxfBhQSpt0Jk%3Fdomain%3Dg.co&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C2389e90a1e23410bb30608dd338c7355%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638723400567770094%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=HJIyHKnuzIPdLDFkOIaG%2BQ3NZhiCr7XX%2BPZk6sKzmwU%3D&reserved=0> 
	3.	Submits orginal Emirates ID and Completes Registration
	4.	After registration, we deliver the car to customer location (Home).

	 

	We can try to same process for your company, where in we will rpovide the sale letter documents and your PRO can visit the AG Aut RTA location and try to complete the registration.

	 

	Let me know how you wish to proceed and we shall prepare the documents accordingly,

	 

	Kind Regards, 

	 

	 

	Morris Nagarajan | Regional Manager - Sales

	M: +971 54 5085646 | morris.nagarajan@nwtnmotors.com <mailto:morris.nagarajan@nwtnmotors.com>

	Subject: RE: Quotation RABDAN ONE : REAL EMIRATES ( REAL FZE ) - Addition of Vehicle wef 03/01/2024

	 

	Dear Rami,

	 

	Hope all is well.

	 

	With reference to the trailing e-mail, kindly provide the insurer with the details of the Rabdan workshop in Abu Dhabi, location and any contact details in hand.

	 

	The reason for the request is since this is a very new vehicle in the market, the insurer needs to know that the vehicle can be repaired in case of an accident at a qualified dealership workshop.

With reference to the trailing e-mail, kindly provide the insurer with the details of the Rabdan workshop in Abu Dhabi, location and any contact details in hand.

	 

	The reason for the request is since this is a very new vehicle in the market, the insurer needs to know that the vehicle can be repaired in case of an accident at a qualified dealership workshop.

	 

	Any details you can provide will help the insurer to be able to cover the vehicle for a comprehensive insurance.

	 

	Look forward to hearing from you.

	 

	Best Regards,

	Hagop

	 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION ‑ INSURANCE

REAL FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 8045000

	Refer to our telecom, GIG has offered us TPL option.

	رسالة من مرسل خارجي - كن حذرًا مع الروابط والمرفقات

	Dear May,

	 

	Currently in Dubai we have been registering for individual customer, but havent done for Companies.

	 

	Process:

	1.	We issue a sale letter to customer
	2.	Customer visits RTA at AG Auto Muraqabat area https://g.co/kgs/AygYDB <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Furl.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com%2Fs%2FpCB7CmMr4Tpy5RLHlhWSRGzcw%3Fdomain%3Dg.co&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C675b5d40e53d429b0fbc08dd3397e4d5%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638723449727398072%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=WAmBumssGiikhf1GPtXZIUcM0GXNu2y3lFN9oB1FEe0%3D&reserved=0> 
	3.	Submits orginal Emirates ID and Completes Registration
	4.	After registration, we deliver the car to customer location (Home).

	 

	We can try to same process for your company, where in we will rpovide the sale letter documents and your PRO can visit the AG Aut RTA location and try to complete the registration.

	 

	Let me know how you wish to proceed and we shall prepare the documents accordingly,

	 

	Kind Regards, 

	 

	 

	Morris Nagarajan | Regional Manager - Sales

	For Abu Dhabi Registration, we need the below.

	 

	1.	Company Trade Licence
	2.	Traffic file number
	3.	Insurance online confirmation
	4.	Authorised Signatory details

	To: Rami Riman <Rami.Riman@chalhoub.com <mailto:Rami.Riman@chalhoub.com> >

	Subject: RE: Quotation RABDAN ONE : REAL EMIRATES ( REAL FZE ) - Addition of Vehicle wef 03/01/2024

	 

	Dear Rami,

	 

	Hope all is well.

	 

	With reference to the trailing e-mail, kindly provide the insurer with the details of the Rabdan workshop in Abu Dhabi, location and any contact details in hand.

	 

	The reason for the request is since this is a very new vehicle in the market, the insurer needs to know that the vehicle can be repaired in case of an accident at a qualified dealership workshop.

With reference to the trailing e-mail, kindly provide the insurer with the details of the Rabdan workshop in Abu Dhabi, location and any contact details in hand.

	 

	The reason for the request is since this is a very new vehicle in the market, the insurer needs to know that the vehicle can be repaired in case of an accident at a qualified dealership workshop.

	 

	Any details you can provide will help the insurer to be able to cover the vehicle for a comprehensive insurance.

	 

	Look forward to hearing from you.

	 

	Best Regards,

	Hagop

	 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​

REAL FZE

DUBAI

	رسالة من مرسل خارجي - كن حذرًا مع الروابط والمرفقات

	Dear May,

	 

	Currently in Dubai we have been registering for individual customer, but havent done for Companies.

	 

	Process:

	1.	We issue a sale letter to customer
	2.	Customer visits RTA at AG Auto Muraqabat area https://g.co/kgs/AygYDB <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Furl.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com%2Fs%2FGZpfCo6w4UD2XKxcBhQSpAwSm%3Fdomain%3Dg.co&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C6acc70f3be8e4dde80d408dd3399a2e5%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638723457254270441%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=vUmPZZ5D33BcTcxP8H4a2tE6U9UyNieUBm4kovwxIC0%3D&reserved=0> 
	3.	Submits orginal Emirates ID and Completes Registration
	4.	After registration, we deliver the car to customer location (Home).

	 

	We can try to same process for your company, where in we will rpovide the sale letter documents and your PRO can visit the AG Aut RTA location and try to complete the registration.

	 

	Let me know how you wish to proceed and we shall prepare the documents accordingly,

	 

	Kind Regards, 

	 

	 

	Morris Nagarajan | Regional Manager - Sales

	M: +971 54 5085646 | morris.nagarajan@nwtnmotors.com <mailto:morris.nagarajan@nwtnmotors.com>

	Dear Mr. Hagop,

	 

	Refer to our telecom, GIG has contacted the below mentioned contact person.

	 

	They could not get any clarity on the spare part cost, average estimate in case of a claim.

	 

	The servicing area too seems to be in a Free Zone and it would be difficult for recovery team to enter the premises.

	 

	Sighting the above difficulties, GIG is unable to consider the vehicle under comprehensive cover.

	 

	Best Regards,

	 

	Mridul Nambiar M.B.A CII (AWARD)

	Senior Relationship Executive - Motor

	Subject: RE: Quotation RABDAN ONE : REAL EMIRATES ( REAL FZE ) - Addition of Vehicle wef 03/01/2024

	 

	Dear Rami,

	 

	Hope all is well.

	 

	With reference to the trailing e-mail, kindly provide the insurer with the details of the Rabdan workshop in Abu Dhabi, location and any contact details in hand.

	 

	The reason for the request is since this is a very new vehicle in the market, the insurer needs to know that the vehicle can be repaired in case of an accident at a qualified dealership workshop.

With reference to the trailing e-mail, kindly provide the insurer with the details of the Rabdan workshop in Abu Dhabi, location and any contact details in hand.

	 

	The reason for the request is since this is a very new vehicle in the market, the insurer needs to know that the vehicle can be repaired in case of an accident at a qualified dealership workshop.

	 

	Any details you can provide will help the insurer to be able to cover the vehicle for a comprehensive insurance.

	 

	Look forward to hearing from you.

	 

	Best Regards,

	Hagop

	 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION ‑ INSURANCE

REAL FZE

DUBAI

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 8045000

This message is from an external sender - be cautious, particularly with links and attachments.
	رسالة من مرسل خارجي - كن حذرًا مع الروابط والمرفقات

	Dear May,

	 

	Currently in Dubai we have been registering for individual customer, but havent done for Companies.

	 

	Process:

	1.	We issue a sale letter to customer
	2.	Customer visits RTA at AG Auto Muraqabat area https://g.co/kgs/AygYDB <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Furl.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com%2Fs%2FGZpfCo6w4UD2XKxcBhQSpAwSm%3Fdomain%3Dg.co&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C39895b9543764ad157c408dd33d2a06a%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638723702017280637%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=3G6PmBQz37WnQ7EhmKeSrvwSqCN76zFAV5huBnhcysI%3D&reserved=0> 
	3.	Submits orginal Emirates ID and Completes Registration
	4.	After registration, we deliver the car to customer location (Home).

	 

	We can try to same process for your company, where in we will rpovide the sale letter documents and your PRO can visit the AG Aut RTA location and try to complete the registration.

	 

	Let me know how you wish to proceed and we shall prepare the documents accordingly,

	 

	Kind Regards, 

	 

	 

	Morris Nagarajan | Regional Manager - Sales

	M: +971 54 5085646 | morris.nagarajan@nwtnmotors.com <mailto:morris.nagarajan@nwtnmotors.com>

Dear Jennifer,

Please ensure that agency repair is included in the policy at no additional cost. Given that this is an electric vehicle manufactured in the UAE, it is essential that repairs, if required, are carried out at an authorized facility equipped with the necessary expertise. 

Third party garages will lack the expertise in repairing a non-mainstream vehicle, compromising both repair quality and claims resolution effectiveness.

Count on your support on this matter.

Thank You & Best regards,
Hagop
